rows.label: qev015202_MSG0001
rows.name: You the one Ajoa hired? Thanks for coming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0002
rows.name:
Looks like you've got the route pretty much cleared out,
which is great news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0003
rows.name:
But before we can rest easy, we've got another pair
of problems to solve.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0004
rows.name: First one's another safety issue, believe it or not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0005
rows.name:
The road to New LA is clear, but the site itself is still
crawling with ugliesâ€”we'll need to take care of 'em
before it's safe to build.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0006
rows.name: The other's a supply problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0007
rows.name:
We lost a shipment of building materials in an attack a
while back, and we need to replace 'em toot sweet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0008
rows.name:
If you could take care of one of those two,
it'd be a huge help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_JNK0010
rows.name: Clear the Site

rows.label: qev015202_SEL0011
rows.name: Agree to handle the indigens.

rows.label: qev015202_JNK0020
rows.name: Secure Items

rows.label: qev015202_SEL0021
rows.name: Offer to find the missing building materials.

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0009
rows.name:
Fair enough. I'm happy to leave the rough stuff to a
pro like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0010
rows.name:
So thanks again, [ST:gender p1=Mr. p2=Ms. ] BLADE. I'll go scrounge up those
materials in the meantime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0011
rows.name:
Perfect. I imagine you BLADEs know the terrain a lot
better than most, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'll be here brainstorming how to handle our little pest
problem in the meantime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0013
rows.name:
So I'm all for manual labor, but combat's not really my
game, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0014
rows.name:
Any interest in an on-site job here once things get
up and running?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0015
rows.name: Hey, you're back. And not a scratch on ya![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0016
rows.name:
Now we can work without getting eaten, which always
makes everyone feel better. Me and the team really
appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0017
rows.name: Oh, and could you give this to Ajoa?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0018
rows.name:
It's water from the site. She's done a million tests
on the stuff already, but apparently there's some
new thing she wants to check.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0019
rows.name:
I keep telling her you could make some killer booze
from this stuff, but does she listen? Nooooo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0020
rows.name:
Guess we'll have to keep toasting with water for now.
Cheers, eh? And thanks again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0021
rows.name:
If you pass that water along to Ajoa, I'm sure she'll
finally see that the water's just fine here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0022
rows.name:
Thanks for offering to help. We need five dawnstones
and five ultra filters, quick as you can get 'em.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0023
rows.name: Ah, perfect! Get everything?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0024
rows.name: Not bad at all. This should speed things up nicely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0025
rows.name:
Thanks a ton. I'll make sure your name's on the plaque
once this thing's all built.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0026
rows.name:
Or I would if we were going to put one up! Ha!
Don't you realize water filtration is about removing
"plaque," not building it? Man, that never gets old...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0027
rows.name: Oh, and could you give this to Ajoa?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0028
rows.name:
It's water from the site. She's done a million tests on
the stuff already, but apparently, there's some new
thing she wants to check.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0029
rows.name:
I keep telling her you could make some killer booze
from this stuff, but does she listen? Nooooo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0030
rows.name:
Guess we'll have to keep toasting with water for now.
Cheers, eh? And thanks again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015202_MSG0031
rows.name:
If you pass that water along to Ajoa, I'm sure she'll
finally see that the water's just fine here.[ST:wait ]
